breakfast.name: Tofu Scramble with Chinese Vegetables and Brown Rice
breakfast.preparation: Sauté ginger and garlic in sesame oil. Add broccoli and carrot, cook until tender-crisp. Add tofu, soy sauce, and turmeric. Scramble until heated through. Serve over brown rice and garnish with green onions.
breakfast.nutritionalBenefits: High in protein, fiber, and complex carbohydrates. Good source of vitamins and minerals like iron, calcium, and vitamin A.
breakfast.healthNotes: Tofu is a good source of protein and helps with weight gain. Brown rice provides sustained energy. Low sodium soy sauce is important for cardiovascular health. Turmeric has anti-inflammatory properties.

lunch.name: Vegan Mapo Tofu with Edamame and Quinoa
ingredients: Chili Bean Paste (doubanjiang, check for gluten-free)
lunch.preparation: Sauté fermented black beans and chili bean paste in sesame oil. Add vegetable broth, soy sauce, cornstarch slurry, and sugar. Simmer. Gently add tofu and simmer until heated through. Serve with edamame and quinoa. Garnish with green onions.
lunch.nutritionalBenefits: Excellent source of plant-based protein and fiber. Quinoa provides complete protein and essential amino acids. Edamame is rich in vitamins and minerals.
lunch.healthNotes: Fermented black beans and chili bean paste provide umami flavor. Quinoa offers sustained energy and supports cardiovascular health. Careful sodium control is crucial.

dinner.name: Vegan Chow Mein with Extra Tofu and Vegetables
dinner.preparation: Cook noodles according to package directions. Sauté ginger and garlic in sesame oil. Add vegetables and cook until tender-crisp. Add pan-fried tofu, noodles, soy sauce, vegetable broth, and cornstarch slurry. Stir-fry until heated through. Garnish with green onions.
dinner.nutritionalBenefits: Provides complex carbohydrates, protein, and fiber. A good source of vitamins and minerals from the vegetables.
dinner.healthNotes: Use rice noodles for a gluten-free option. Pan-fried tofu adds extra protein for weight gain. Ensure low sodium content to manage cardiovascular health.

snacks.name: Peanut Butter and Banana Sandwich on Gluten-Free Bread
snacks.preparation: Spread peanut butter on gluten-free bread slices. Add sliced banana. Top with another slice of bread.
snacks.nutritionalBenefits: Provides healthy fats, protein, and carbohydrates for sustained energy. Good source of potassium and fiber.
snacks.healthNotes: Provides a boost of calories and protein to support weight gain. Choose natural peanut butter without added sugars or salt.
